title: Add simple password protection to admin dashboard

requirements.text: Update the PasswordAuth component in frontend/src/components/admin/PasswordAuth.tsx to replace the hardcoded 'admin123' password with a configurable password value that can be set via environment variable or configuration
acceptanceCriteria: Password is stored in a configuration file or environment variable instead of being hardcoded
Admin can change the password without modifying component code
Password input and validation logic remains unchanged

requirements.text: Add password configuration to frontend/src/content/hi.ts or a separate config file that stores the admin password securely for the password protection feature
acceptanceCriteria: Password is stored in a centralized location
Configuration is easy to locate and update
Password remains functional with existing PasswordAuth component

requirements.text: Add user-facing error message in Hindi to frontend/src/content/hi.ts for incorrect password attempts in the admin dashboard authentication
acceptanceCriteria: Error message is stored in the Hindi content file
Message clearly indicates incorrect password in Hindi
PasswordAuth component can reference this message

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Maintain existing password authentication flow in PasswordAuth component
Keep sessionStorage-based authentication state management unchanged
